title: IMFACT ask you to be their lovers in teaser images for 'Please Be My First Love' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me IMFACT ask you to be their lovers in teaser images for 'Please Be My First Love' By yckim124 7 minutes ago 776 75 0 0 Google+ IMFACT want you to be their first love for their second ' IMFACTORY ' project!
The boys promised fans to have a new release every month of 2017. It's now February, which means IMFACT will treat fans with a second release. Just now, they unveiled individual teasers for the upcoming track titled " Please Be My First Love ". They take on an adorable boyfriend concept, asking you out in the sweetest ways. 
Are you ready to be IMFACT's first love on February 27? YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
